name: We Wish You Best of Luck
name_original: We Wish You Best of Luck
description:
You work inside an unknow industrial complex. Your goal is simple: interact 100 times on LCD panels within 660 seconds. Be careful, follow the rules and get help.

Controls:

  • WASD: move
  • Mouse: look
  • Left Mouse Button: interact with panel
  • Left Shift: run
  • Esc: pause

We Wish You Best of Luck is a short first person experience about work, change and time made in Unreal Engine 5.1. It's our first real production, we made it mainly to learn Unreal Engine features and narrative design practice. We made the game with asset pack available on Epic marketplace 'cause our team is composed of only one programmer and one writer.

Game is designed for a maximum length of 11 minutes. It has 1 normal ending and 2 "game over" endings.

For a better experience, we raccomend to use headphones.

We're not an english speaking team, we forgive you in advance for some translation errors.

We just need any kind of feedback :)

Hope you can enjoy it.

If you interested, you can find the press kit.
